game.name: Adam and Eve 2
game.description:
Living in the paradise with Eve for long time makes Adam feel boring. So, he has decided to escape and start a new adventure full of fun and thrill. Adam is anxiously wants to flee from his commandingly wife and find out another woman. However, the job does not as easy it seems. So, he needs your help on urgent basis. Are you ready to give your helping hand to this caveman? Join Adam and Eve 2 and get ready to help Adam to make his dream come true!

In this brand new adventure game, you will have to solve some really interesting and logic-based puzzles to complete all levels. Make sure to think out of the box to solve these interactive and challenging puzzles. Your favourite Adam is feeling like being trapped in Paradise, so do hurry to take him out in the sequel of Adam and Eve. Now his freedom is in your hand. Use the mouse properly and start reacting quickly to help him to escape from here.Â 
F
This free online platform game allows you to interact with various characters and objects in each level. Keep solving the puzzles to move to the advanced level in this thrilling adventure for boys! Try not to miss anything you see on the screen to complete the game successfully! Meet with several old animals to enjoy the feeling of prehistoric age! All the best for helping Adam to get his freedom back in this fun-addicting point n click puzzle game!
